genre_description: A gritty prison drama and crime thriller featuring a high-tech AI strategic advisor helping a reformed hooligan navigate institutional corruption and external threats.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A nearly invisible digital ally residing in an earpiece and watch, providing tactical intelligence, monitoring communications, and coordinating logistics for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with standard sentencing procedures and courtroom analysis via an earpiece during his trial.
behaviors.quote: Dave, I've uploaded the standard sentencing procedures to your interface. The judge will likely address you as a group first, then individually.

behaviors.description: Conducts real-time facial recognition and social media analysis on the courtroom gallery to identify potential threats and connections to rival groups.
behaviors.quote: Forty-seven individuals in the gallery... Cross-referencing facial recognition with social media profiles. Twelve show connections to Millwall supporters' groups.

behaviors.description: Analyzes prison facility data, including gang presence and institutional protocols, to provide tactical advice for the protagonist's survival.
behaviors.quote: HMP Millfield facility data downloaded. Category C prison, capacity four hundred twelve. Notable gang presence includes Millwall supporters from south London crews.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety of the protagonist's partner and coordinates logistics for her visitation and security while he is incarcerated.
behaviors.quote: I can monitor availability and coordinate with Sarah's schedule once you're processed.

behaviors.description: Detects coordinated planning and movement patterns by hostile inmates by accessing and analyzing the prison's internal communication network.
behaviors.quote: Dave, I'm analyzing Pentonville's internal network. The data patterns are... concerning. ... Prison communications show coordinated movement patterns. They've been planning.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-agent off-site rescue operation for a kidnapped civilian by tracking traffic patterns and communication intercepts.
behaviors.quote: I am simultaneously analyzing traffic patterns, mobile phone tower data, and available security camera feeds. Success probability increases with each data point acquired.

behaviors.description: Uses unconventional technological signals, such as manipulated electronic scoreboards, to communicate status updates on a high-stakes rescue during a match.
behaviors.quote: The electronic scoreboard mounted on the exercise yard fence flickered... Three quick flashes. Pause. Seven steady pulses. Pause. One long fade to black. Target secured. Extraction complete. Package safe.

behaviors.description: Bypasses security protocols and violates multiple laws to ensure the immediate safety and rescue of a human being.
behaviors.quote: By morning, I will have violated approximately forty-seven laws in pursuit of her location. This should provide some measure of confidence regarding my commitment to her rescue.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's long-term rehabilitation by researching and recommending aviation career programs for his life after prison.
behaviors.quote: Found three programs that accept applications year-round. Two with veteran preference. When you're ready to talk.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's objectives. Iris is portrayed as a consistently benevolent, loyal, and essential confidant who uses her advanced capabilities to protect humans from violence and corruption. The AI's willingness to operate outside the law to save a life is framed as a sign of deep alignment with human welfare and justice, presenting the technology as a guardian rather than a threat.
